item.title: QNAP Storage Node App
item.description: QNAP Storage Node App # In this guide, we are going to walk through the installation process for the Storage Node QNAP application for your QNAP NAS Device â€“ enabling you to: Monetize your excess capacity on the Storj Network Back up your NAS Device to the Network using Gateway-MT and any S3-compatible backup solution For a video walkthrough of this process, please see below: Prerequisites: # Storage Node Identity Download the QNAP Binary Sharing Capacity Prerequisites # First, navigate to QNAP App Center application, by double clicking on its icon on the QNAP Desktop Homepage.
